feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Business One
feed.subtitle: SAP Business One Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Clarification on CVE-2025-42951 ‚Äì Which Support Package Patches Are Safe?
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I‚Äôm reviewing SAP Security Note 3625403 regarding CVE-2025-42951 (Broken Authorization in SAP Business One SLD).

In the note it says: ‚ÄúPlease implement the Support Packages and Patches referenced in this SAP security Note.‚Äù
When I click on the Support Package Patches link inside the note, it redirects me to the SAP Download Center where I see a full list of installation packages (Feature Packages, Support Packages, etc.) for SAP Business One 10.0.

My question is:

  • Are all versions listed on that download page considered safe, or

  • Is the vulnerability fixed only in Support Package Patches released after 12 August 2025 (the publication date of the note)?

I want to be sure whether older Feature Packages shown in that list (e.g. FP 2011, FP 2208, etc.) are actually patched, or if only the newer ones (2502 and later) include the fix.

Has anyone clarified this with SAP or tested which Support Package levels are secured?

Thanks in advance for your input!

entry.title: Adding UDF through DTW on BP Bank Setup window
entry.content:
Hi All,

We do not have an option to create UDF's on BP Bank Partner window.

However, I can create udf's to this window using dtw.

Do you think we could have issues in future if we do this or is this ok? Should I submit a ticket with SAP to check this?

Please advise.

Regards,

Joseph

entry.title: Approval Model Query Problem
entry.content:
Hi everyone,üò±

I'm encountering an issue with the approval process in SAP Business One. I've configured a query to trigger approval only when at least one item in a sales quotation has a gross profit percentage below 27%.

The query checks each line individually, not the overall gross profit of the document. The idea is:

  • If any item has a gross profit percentage below 27%, the approval should be triggered.
  • If all items have a gross profit percentage above 27%, the approval should not be triggered ‚Äî even if the total gross profit is affected by other items.

However, the main problem is that the approval still gets triggered even when all items have a gross profit percentage higher than 27%. I've also tested using other fields like StickPrice and LineTotal, but the issue persists.

It seems like the system is evaluating the total gross profit or applying the condition incorrectly. Has anyone faced this behavior or found a reliable way to ensure the approval only activates when at least one item falls below the threshold?

My actual query is this but i tried differents query fields but nothing.

SELECT DISTINCT 'TRUE' FROM OQUT T0  INNER JOIN QUT1 T1 ON T0."DocEntry" = T1."DocEntry"      
WHERE T1."DocEntry" = T0."DocEntry"
AND T1."LineTotal"  > 0
AND T1."StickPrice" > 0
AND T1."Quantity" > 0 
AND ((T1."LineTotal" - (T1."Quantity" * T1."StickPrice"))   / NULLIF (T1."LineTotal", 0)) * 100 < 27

Version Sap 9.3 

Thanks in advance for your help!

I'm using SAP B1 version 10.

Thank you.

entry.title: CCO RECEIPT REPOST
entry.content:
I have full day data of customer checkout CCO lost  from customer checkout manager, and sap business one. 

all receipts are stills how on CCO, each one is under status of posted, transmitted, transmitted ccom

what is the best way I can repost these invoices to ccom again then sap business one . 

I tried repost one receipt as a test, it showed "receipt has been reposted" but nothing happened actually, I tried to export receipts from the CCO but it only exported the # and total amounts but not items. 

tried to pull the data from HANA Studio, but it shows no data . 

had anyone faced such an issue, and how do we sort it out ?

thanks

Thanks

entry.title: AR Invoice showing incorrect stock quantity
entry.content:
Dear SAP Team,

We have encountered an issue at our customer related to an AR Invoice.

In the AR, there is a UDF: U_KD_BRNG_PJK Row=1 Variable=11 INV1.U_KD_BRNG_PJK.
For example, in the AR Invoice the value appears as 281100, but when we run a query, the result shows 0.

Our question: why does the query return 0, while in the AR Invoice the value is clearly shown as 281100?

Additional information:

The UDF is Alphanumeric with a length of 20 characters.

This issue only occurs in one invoice.

Thank you for your assistance.

entry.title: FMS QUERY Batch Details Expiry Date Update Count
entry.content:
Hi All

Please help how to Edit this FMS Query on Batch Details UDF Field to auto Count when Expiry Date is Edited.

This FMS Query is working in 2019 SQL Database but not working in 2022 SQL Database.

[Microsoft][ODBC Driver 18 for SQL Server][SQL Server]Incorrect syntax near ','. 2). [Microsoft][ODBC Driver 18 for SQL Server][SQL Server]Statement 'Items' (OITM) (s) could not be prepared.

 IF ISNULL($[OBTN.U_counter],'') = ''

 

BEGIN 
  SELECT '1' 
END

 

BEGIN 
  SELECT $[OBTN.U_counter]+ 1 FROM OBTN 
END

 

Kedalene Chong

entry.title: Picking Allowed Despite Negative Available Quantity, Order Confirmation Blocked in SAP
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have a Sales Order where SAP allowed allocation of 473 pcs in Bin Location Allocation ‚Äì Issue, even though the available quantity shows -41 pcs. The scanner permits Pick and Pack, but when I try to confirm the order, the process is blocked, and I cannot print the Delivery Order.

Could you help me understand why this happens and how to resolve it?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: SAP B1/SQL Server 2019 Query Error when entering Parameter
entry.content:
If i use QUERY by not use '[%0]' No Problem

SELECT
B.Bo_Pl_No AS [WMS No.],
X.TransferNo AS [Transfer No.],
CONVERT(date, B.Bo_CreateDate) AS [Date],
P.Tp_ItemCode AS [Item No.],
I.ItemName AS [Item Name],
CAST(P.Tp_Qty AS decimal(19,6)) AS [Quantity],
B.Bo_No AS [Box No.]
FROM dbo.TB_Box AS B
JOIN dbo.TB_TempPick AS P ON P.Tp_Box = B.Bo_No
LEFT JOIN OITM AS I ON I.ItemCode = P.Tp_ItemCode
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT
COALESCE(CAST(T.U_wmsno AS nvarchar(50)),
CAST(T.U_plateno AS nvarchar(50))) AS WMSNo,
STRING_AGG(CAST(T.DocNum AS nvarchar(20)), ', ')
WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY T.DocNum) AS TransferNo
FROM OWTR T
JOIN NNM1 S
ON S.Series = T.Series
AND S.ObjectCode = '67'
WHERE T.CANCELED = 'N'
AND S.SeriesName LIKE 'ITS%'
GROUP BY COALESCE(CAST(T.U_wmsno AS nvarchar(50)),
CAST(T.U_plateno AS nvarchar(50)))
) AS X ON CAST(B.Bo_Pl_No AS nvarchar(50)) = X.WMSNo

WHERE
B.Bo_Active = 1
AND P.Tp_Active = 1
AND (ISNULL('','') = '' OR CONVERT(date, B.Bo_CreateDate) >= CONVERT(date, ''))
AND (ISNULL('','') = '' OR CONVERT(date, B.Bo_CreateDate) <= CONVERT(date, ''))
AND (ISNULL('','') = '' OR B.Bo_Pl_No = '')
AND (ISNULL('','') = '' OR B.Bo_No = '')
ORDER BY
B.Bo_CreateDate, B.Bo_Pl_No, B.Bo_No, P.Tp_ItemCode;

But if i entering Parameter such as '[%0]' will be error immediately

Error 'Received Alert' (OAIB)

SELECT
B.Bo_Pl_No AS [WMS No.],
X.TransferNo AS [Transfer No.],
CONVERT(date, B.Bo_CreateDate) AS [Date],
P.Tp_ItemCode AS [Item No.],
I.ItemName AS [Item Name],
CAST(P.Tp_Qty AS decimal(19,6)) AS [Quantity],
B.Bo_No AS [Box No.]
FROM dbo.TB_Box AS B
JOIN dbo.TB_TempPick AS P ON P.Tp_Box = B.Bo_No
LEFT JOIN OITM AS I ON I.ItemCode = P.Tp_ItemCode
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT
COALESCE(CAST(T.U_wmsno AS nvarchar(50)),
CAST(T.U_plateno AS nvarchar(50))) AS WMSNo,
STRING_AGG(CAST(T.DocNum AS nvarchar(20)), ', ')
WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY T.DocNum) AS TransferNo
FROM OWTR T
JOIN NNM1 S
ON S.Series = T.Series
AND S.ObjectCode = '67'
WHERE T.CANCELED = 'N'
AND S.SeriesName LIKE 'ITS%'
GROUP BY COALESCE(CAST(T.U_wmsno AS nvarchar(50)),
CAST(T.U_plateno AS nvarchar(50)))
) AS X ON CAST(B.Bo_Pl_No AS nvarchar(50)) = X.WMSNo

WHERE
B.Bo_Active = 1
AND P.Tp_Active = 1
AND (ISNULL('[%0]','') = '' OR CONVERT(date, B.Bo_CreateDate) >= CONVERT(date, '[%0]'))
AND (ISNULL('[%1]','') = '' OR CONVERT(date, B.Bo_CreateDate) <= CONVERT(date, '[%1]'))
AND (ISNULL('[%2]','') = '' OR B.Bo_Pl_No = '[%2]')
AND (ISNULL('[%3]','') = '' OR B.Bo_No = '[%3]')
ORDER BY
B.Bo_CreateDate, B.Bo_Pl_No, B.Bo_No, P.Tp_ItemCode;

entry.title: SAP Business One 2502 SQL SBO mailer service Stuck
entry.content: I am using SAP Business one 2502 version SQL . i faced a problem my sbo mailer service is stuck in every 8 to 10 days. Service is running but mail not send when i restart service SBO mailer running fine. What is the issue ?

entry.title: SAP Business One UI Configuration + Boyum Item Placement Tool
entry.content:
What is the exact method to use UI Configuration and Boyum IPT.

UI Configuration:
US Simple
1. Should I create another Group such as "Company Base" copy from US Simple and then make edits.
2. Apply a user.
3. Use IPT for Function Buttons

If I do that and then I need to make a change in one of the tabs or Form Settings in UI Configuration, is that okay?
In my experience as soon as make any change even an active/non-active status on a matrix col. It places all the IPT buttons on the UI including the US Simple.

Your help is greatly appreciated. If you have a how-to/tutorial video I would greatly appreciate it.

entry.title: SAP Business One Version Upgrade on Cloud Control Center
entry.content:
Hi 

i am looking for guidance on SAP Business One version upgrade on Cloud Control Center Architecture.

Currently i am running  1000.280.18 (2502 Release) and i am going to upgrade it to Version 2508.

Cloud Control Center Version 1.1 PL20 Hotfix 3

1. i have downloaded 2508 and replaced the existing files in repository with new files

2. When i am running pre-upgrade test wizard its showing new version with 0 service units (in my CCC only having 1 service unit and 1 db instance so its not allowed to add new service unit)

3. also my service unit status showing alert icon from long time ago but it was not effected to the functionality.

Can someone guide what are steps should i follow ?

entry.title: Goods issue transaction added without having authorization to user
entry.content:
Dear Team,
We have identified a user who does not have authorization rights for the Goods Issue transaction, yet the transaction has been recorded under their ID.
We have reviewed the change log in the user's authorization settings. Further investigation may be required to understand how this occurred.
